markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spirits' Interference](/Feats.aspx?ID=150) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 91 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[spirit instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

You call forth protective spirits to ward off ranged attacks. Until your rage ends, anyone making a ranged attack against you must succeed at a DC 5 flat check or the attack misses with no effect.
name: Spirits' Interference

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 6" pfs="Standard" > Spirits' Interference Single Action Source Core Rulebook pg. 91 4.0 Prerequisites spirit instinct --- You call forth protective spirits to ward off ranged attacks. Until your rage ends, anyone making a ranged attack against you must succeed at a DC 5 flat check or the attack misses with no effect.
